text: Harthorne Nathaniel Wingo (September 9, 1947 â€“ January 23, 2021) was an American professional basketball player. He was born in Tryon, North Carolina. He played four seasons, from 1972 to 1976, in the National Basketball Association as a member of the New York Knicks. Wingo died on January 23, 2021 at the age of 73.Harthorne Wingo, Polk County's only NBA player, passes away at 73 ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2021 deaths Category:New York Knicks players Category:Sportspeople from North Carolina
title: Harthorne Wingo
